page.title: 20Llandudno Development.
page.content: { A SHOPPING ARCADE}is proposed on the site of the Town Hall (retaining the facade) and adjacent land. Two develop -ers have expressed interest in the scheme, publicised as a high class development of small, exclusive shops, one advocate stating that it would make Llandudno the{'Bond Street' of N. {Wales.}Plans submitted so far have met with mixed feelings and the proposed development is very much in the early stages. The town has been linked with the story of{Alice in Wonderland}(seeLocal History) and it is proposed to develop a{Theme Park}on Bodafon Fields (not within this grid, but the whole town would be affected). Those wishing to retain the unspoilt eastern approach, and the Chamber of Trade, are against; others feel that more should be done to provide amenities for tourists.
